text: Theodore William Schultz (; 30 April 1902 – 26 February 1998) was an American economist. He was the chairman of the University of Chicago Department of Economics. He won the 1979 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American economists Category:Scientists from South Dakota Category:University of Chicago faculty Category:University of Wisconsin–Madison alumni
title: Theodore Schultz
